amendment.description: An amendment numbered 71 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the use of funds to finalize, implement, or enforce the notice of proposed rulemaking related to Automatic Emergency Braking.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
